Overview
Overview / Product overview / Features / Document processing features / Usage scenarios for processing documents / Usage scenarios for PDF jobs
Usage scenarios for PDF jobs
These scenarios show the steps that a workflow might follow as it processes PDF jobs.
In this section:
Sorting (one-to-one) PDF job scenario
This scenario describes how you can sort a PDF job so that its documents print in a certain order.
Splitting (one-to-many) PDF job scenario
This scenario describes how you can divide a large PDF job into smaller ones. Benefits of this approach is that it might reduce overall printing
time or share your printing resources.
Parent topic: Usage scenarios for processing documents
